column5: So lets have em!  Whats your sled.  Post Pics if you have em!
Not quite a sled but a mighty fine ice fishing machine, I'm fitting it with a full enclosure and tracks to make it even better.
Ted how do you like your Clam Shelter and where did you buy it?
2003 polaris rmk 700!! my trail breaker/baby! and i didnt notice but your another saultite to! you name the lake. i'll blaze trail
heres mine...attach my sleigh right to the back
Here's my winter vehicle and living quarters...
So far pretty happy with it but I will know better once I get it out for 1st time. Picked it up @ BassPro on sale a few weeks back. Cheers Ted
